name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Summary

A short description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Motivation

**What problem does this solve?** Describe the use case that drives this request. Features are much more likely to be accepted when there's a clear user need.

## Proposed Solution

How would you like this to work? Describe the behavior, UI changes, or workflow.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative approaches? Why is your proposed solution preferable?

## Additional Context

Any mockups, examples from other apps, or other relevant context.
